titles.title: To prohibit Federal funding for the election of officers and trustees of the International Brotherhood of Teamsters.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Employer-Employee Relations.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

bill.summary: 10/9/1997--Introduced. Prohibits obligation or expenditure of any Federal funds to pay the expenses of an election officer appointed by a court to oversee an election of any officer or trustee of the International Brotherhood of Teamsters.
